metadata.title: CVE-2019-11760 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A fixed-size stack buffer could overflow in nrappkit when doing WebRTCsignaling. This resulted in a potentially exploitable crash in someinstances. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 70, Thunderbird < 68.2, andFirefox ESR < 68.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
